name: SliverFillRemaining
desc: A sliver that contains a single box child that fills the remaining space in the viewport.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: Box child widget that fills the remaining space in the viewport.

fields.name: hasScrollBody
fields.desc: Indicates whether the child has a scrollable body, this value cannot be null.

fields.name: fillOverscroll
fields.desc: Indicates whether the child should stretch to fill the overscroll area created by certain scroll physics, such as iOS' default scroll physics. This flag is only relevant when [hasScrollBody] is false.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of SliverFillRemaining
desc: 【hasScrollBody】: Whether it has a scroll body 【bool】
【fillOverscroll】: Whether it can fill the scroll area 【bool】
